message.body: I'm going to a funeral in Culpepper, VA tomorrow.
I'm going to a baby shower in Richmond on Sunday. Actually waiting for the train now
We're gonna stay in Arlington tonight.
Is the funeral someone close to you?
The woman who died was my friend Dave's nanny, Eleanor. I'm going along to support him. She was like a member of his family.
I lived there when I was 2!
My regards. Hunters uncle passed away yesterday. He tried to get a flight to Atlanta today but it was canceled twice so he stayed here
Oh man. That sucks. I'm sorry to hear that.
I knew Eleanor from going to Dave's house in high school. She was really nice. It seemed like she was really old even back then.
It's funny how older People are old forever. Well safe travels this weekend
